beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook: populateContainerSizes
"before each" hook: populateContainerStats
"before each" hook: populateContainers

tests.title: should return an array of container sizes
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS GET /containers/sizes should return an array of container sizes

tests.title: should create a new container size
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS POST /containers/sizes should create a new container size

tests.title: should not create a new container size with invalid input
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS POST /containers/sizes should not create a new container size with invalid input

tests.title: should return a specific container size
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS GET /containers/sizes/:id should return a specific container size

tests.title: should not return a specific container size with invalid :id
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS GET /containers/sizes/:id should not return a specific container size with invalid :id

tests.title: should patch a container size successfully
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS PATCH /containers/sizes/:id should patch a container size successfully

tests.title: should not patch a container size with errors
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS PATCH /containers/sizes/:id should not patch a container size with errors

tests.title: should not patch a container size with invalid ID
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS PATCH /containers/sizes/:id should not patch a container size with invalid ID

tests.title: should not patch a container size with size that exists
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS PATCH /containers/sizes/:id should not patch a container size with size that exists

tests.title: should delete the container size
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS DELETE /containers/sizes/:id should delete the container size

tests.title: should not delete the container size with invalid id
tests.fullTitle: CONTAINERS DELETE /containers/sizes/:id should not delete the container size with invalid id
